Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.model.Invoice

    public class Invoice
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Invoice>
    The Class that handles the data of hotel's invoices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Invoice

        public Invoice​(java.lang.String invoiceId,
               java.lang.String guestId,
               java.lang.String roomTypeAsStr,
               double roomPrice,
               boolean isRoomWifiEnabled,
               java.lang.String reservationId,
               int nights,
               java.lang.String dateOfPayment,
               double taxRate,
               double discountRate,
               java.util.ArrayList<Order> orders,
               double subTotal,
               double total)
        Constructor of Invoice
        Parameters:
        invoiceId - Id of the invoice
        guestId - Id of the guest
        roomTypeAsStr - Room type of the stay
        roomPrice - Room price of the room
        isRoomWifiEnabled - Wifi enabled room
        reservationId - Id of the reservation
        nights - Nights spent in the hotel
        dateOfPayment - Date which the payment is made
        taxRate - Tax rate of the invoice
        discountRate - Discount rate of the invoice
        orders - ArrayList of Order object that the room had made
        subTotal - Total amount without tax rate and discount rate
        total - Total amount with tax rate and discount rate
